Value.label: Power, energy detection mode
Value.Help: For parameters of 101 ~ 103, power, energy detection mode configuration

Value.label: Selective reporting
Value.Help: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

Value.label: Wattage Threshold Whole HEM
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C1
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C2
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change Whole HEM
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C1
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C2
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Reset #101-103
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group1. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 2: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 3: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

Value.label: Group 2 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group2. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 2: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 3: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

Value.label: Group 3 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group3. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 2: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 3: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Reserved Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Reserved Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

Value.label: Group 1 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 1.

Value.label: Group 2 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 2

Value.label: Group 3 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 3

Item.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
